txt.en:
'At your service, [placeholder]. A fine adventurer such as yourself would appreciate the joy that I describe in the crafting of dwarf-rings. Such a thing is a wonder to behold! Aye, when you place a well-crafted dwarf-ring upon your finger, watching its gentle curves glimmer in the torch-light, it stirs even the coldest of hearts.

'I would ask you to prove your worth and bring me five dwarf-rings. Such a token would prove your alliance to the Dwarves of Thorin's Hall.
'It took a skilled hand to craft these dwarf-rings. I commend you on your success, [placeholder]!'
'You have yet to bring me the dwarf-rings? A talented provisioner not only knows how to be patient, but will also conclude the order they have been tasked with!'
The Dwarves of the Blue Mountains are best known for their jewel and iron-craft.
The Blue Stone Garrison is located just inside Thorin's Hall.\n\nÍsrath has requested that you bring him crafted dwarf-rings.
